cards.name: Rok
cards.description: When LP is below 25% of Max LP, all attacks of Rok deals Fire Damage and gains Burning. BT is increased by 1 Turn.

cards.name: Aura of Magic
cards.description: Deals 65 Normal Damage to opponent. If equipped by a Magic wielder, regenerates 20 MP per use.

cards.name: Talisman of Calamity
cards.description: Deals 80 Normal Damage to opponent. If equipped by a Fire ruler, your character gains a shield which blocks only Essence Damages, DP:80 and DT:2 Turns.

cards.name: Sparking Punch
cards.description: Deals 60 Normal Damage to opponent. Increases BD by 2% for 6 Turns. Duration of this effect cannot be stacked.

cards.name: Wounding Ember
cards.description: Deals 100 Fire Damage to opponent. Inflicts Burning.

cards.name: Altering Pyre
cards.description:
Has 3 charges. Can be used after being activated. Gains different features according to Turns waited:
1+ Turns: Deals 300 Fire Damage to opponent. Inflicts Burning.
3+ Turns: Deals 5% Fire Damage to opponent. Increases BD by 4% for this instance and inflicts Burning.
5+ Turns: Deals 10% Fire Damage to opponent. Increases BD by 4% for this instance and inflicts Burning.

cards.name: Fierceful Recover
cards.description: Your character recovers 40 MP at beginning of every Turn for 4 Turns.

cards.name: Blazing Dash
cards.description: Your character becomes Immune. Multiply BD by 2. (This operation is always calculated as the last step of math.) Lasts for 5 separate attacks executed by you.

setBonus.description: If all 5 Charms of Flames of Crimson Rage set are equipped, each of them increases BD by 2% instead.
